scripts.up: npm run build_docker_backend && npm run build_docker_frontend && sudo UID=${UID} GID=${GID} HOST_OS_APPS_PATH=$(pwd)/backend/data/apps docker stack deploy --detach=false --prune -c ./docker-swarm-local-dev.yml lores-node-dev; sudo docker ps; npm run logs
scripts.restart: npm run down; npm run waitdown; npm run up
scripts.waitdown: timeout 30 bash -c 'while [ $(npm run backend_cid --silent) ]; do echo "waiting for backend to stop..."; sleep 2; done'
